name: codex-title
description: Contracts for Codex Protocol's Codex Title

scripts.migrate: truffle migrate --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:reset: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --reset --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:staging: truffle migrate --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:reset:staging: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run copy:staging
scripts.migrate:production: truffle migrate --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.migrate:reset:production: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --reset --network mainnet && npm run copy:production
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol

author: Codex Protocol <contact@codexprotocol.com>
